titleStmt.title: At Mr. Brett's, an apothecary, at the upper-end of Prescot-Street, in Goodmans-Fields, London, liveth a chirurgion, who infallibly cures all sorts of squint, or blear eyes, in a short time, without pain or danger, in either age of infancy, tho' of long continuance; ...
titleStmt.author: Brett, Mr.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
